root.name: Gdleen
root.description: OverviewGdleen is a Japanese role-playing game developed by Jorudan and published by SETA on May 28, 1991 for the Super Famicom. The game was the very first RPG to be released for the Super Famicom coming out six months after the console's launch. Gdleen is based off an anime OVA (original video animation) of the same name from 1990 by Tokyo Laboratory. Both the game and the anime are adapted from a series of light novels that were released from 1989 to 1991 by Yuto Ramon titled "Jiko Wakusei Gdleen."

similar_games.game: Dragon Quest V: Hand of the Heavenly Bride
